name: bigspring-astro
title: Bigspring Astro
desc: Minimal Astro Theme for SaaS & Marketing Websites
article:
Bigspring is a modern, responsive business template crafted using Astro version 4. It boasts a sleek, minimalistic design and comes complete with 20+ pre-designed pages. This template is particularly well-suited for SaaS and marketing websites. 



Key Features

  • Highly customizable (Color, Font, Menu, Social Links, SEO Meta Tags, etc.)
  • Fast by default (95+ Google PageSpeed Score)
  • Netlify setting pre-configured
  • Contact form support
  • Pricing table
  • Write and update content in Markdown / MDX
  • MDX components auto import
  • Includes draft pages and posts
  • Built with Astro v5 and Tailwind CSS v4
  • Fully responsive on desktops, tablets, and smartphones
  • SEO Friendly
  • Clean folder structure
  • Simple and easy development environment setup
  • Compatible with all modern browsers
  • Free Google fonts
  • Font Awesome icons
  • Clean code

Pages 

  1. Homepage
  2. Company
  3. Careers
  4. Careers details
  5. Contact
  6. Pricing
  7. Case Studies
  8. Case study details
  9. FAQs
  10. Privacy Policy
  11. Terms & Condition
  12. Custom 404
  13. Blog 
  14. Blog single
  15. Authors
  16. Author single
  17. Product
  18. Product details
  19. How it works
  20. About
  21. Team


This theme is also available in free version.
